value.title: Discovering the Azure Architecture Center | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this episode of Azure Tips and Tricks, discover the Azure Architecture Center which is full of useful knowledge and resources.   For more tips and tricks, visit: https://aka.ms/azuretipsandtricks    Get started with 12 months of free services and $200 USD in credit. Create your free account today

value.title: Enabling secure remote work using Windows Virtual Desktop | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Windows Virtual Desktop (WVD) is a comprehensive desktop and app virtualization service running in Azure to enable secure remote work. Christiaan Brinkhoff joins Scott Hanselman to show how WVD is different from other desktop virtualization technologies, as well as how easy it is to implement and maintain.

value.title: Get a unified network monitoring experience with Network Insights | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Using Networks Insights to view health, metrics, alerts, and signals from all network monitoring tools in one place, Dalan Mendonca shows Scott Hanselman that there's no need to scramble across tools to troubleshoot your network issues in Azure.  0:00 – Intro to Network Insights 4:30 – Network health

value.title: Go serverless: Real-time applications with Azure SignalR Service | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Modern applications light up with real-time information. value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, Alfred from the Azure Serial Console team will show you how to enable GRUB on your Ubuntu virtual machine. value.excerpt: In this video, learn about Azure best practices on how to add a custom domain to your web app and how to secure your custom domain with an App Service Managed Certificate.
